Text:
Finally Eng Dub and only 700+ mb .
Great quality.
Thanks sharing this vid.
thanks for the work you put in to make this. pretty hard to find one thats english dub and in avi. hopefully it will work on ps3/xbox as well :)

It has black borders all round but watched full screen on VLC so no problem there. As far as the movie goes it takes on a novel approach and the animation style used for the virtual world was new for me and I liked it. Grandma made a good point that hunger and loneliness are the greatest horrors known to man.
I was not expecting much but on a hot summer evening as the dark shadows of gloom were engulfing me as I sat worn out by this worlds endless races I saw this movie and it made me happy so stormium thank you.
